oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement from Nashville City Directory, 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page of advertisement from the 1871 Nashville City Directory featuring Rich & Krieg Chair and Furniture Factory. The ware-rooms were located at 12 N. College Street, with the factory at the corner of Summer (5th Avenue), Madison and Cherry Streets (Fourth Avenue) in downtown Nashville. Forms part of Nashville City Directory Collection, Metro Archives. 1 digital image.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rich & Krieg (Nashville, Tenn.)
